attributes.action: Change the time that schools start to 10am
attributes.background: It is scientifically proven that teenager"s brains need more time to wake up. If they can go to school at 10am rather than 7/8am, they will be better at learning and at doing the work that is set for them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require schools across England to start the school day at 10am.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575809
